description: I was looking for a spreadsheet app that had a familiar layout close to microsoft. Great since I'll only be dabbling monthly or so and I won't have to re-learn much each time.
Very functional and complete office suite, and it looks great too.

A very good app, almost a complete replacement for
ms office. Nice looking and very useful. You carry on like that.

Having RTL support is a fundamental feature of any word proccessor. Not having that means more than half a billion people can't use your software in their native language! Heck w3.org estimates it in over a billion!
https://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-scripts
can do everything i need and my languige is suported so 9,5/10

Clean interface, functionally superior! The Forms Editor is a game-changer, as it makes it easy to make fillable PDF forms. The spreadsheet app is comprehensive, although it is slow to load on older hardware. The fact that it's a single application with tabs for different types of documents (open at the same time) is also revolutionary and super-convenient. The amount of interoperability with MS Office means there are no headaches during migration. If a Grammarly plugin can be added I will give it 6 stars! Simply the greatest value in a single app on my PC right now.

The app is great, the toolbar or ribbon is way too small... I cant even read it without squinting and bringing my face close to the screen. The scaling is maxed out on 200% but still no improvement. I have been back and forth emailing them trying to get this problem solved with no joy. Forums require login so thats not an option for me. I will wait till that gets fixed before I use it.

This is the closest thing to MS Office that I was able to find. I was looking for an app that would allow proper watermark or handle .doc/.docx with watermark. This one does. 
For me it just works.
summary: The closest thing to MS Office

description:
First I'd like to say thanks to the devs for converting the app to flatpak! No more manually fixing the gnutls curl and broken icon, makes my life easier.

Regarding the app itself, despite low performance and rough edges this is the closest you can get to viewing and editing MS documents using a freeware. Mmmuch better than LibreOffice for my use case.

OnlyOffice definitely works and also provides a friendly, Ribbon-like user interface. However, in my testing I didn't find to be impressively better than LibreOffice, not nearly as much as to back the company's claims of "100% compatible with MS Office formats", and its Electron-based engine doesn't manage to improve in performance and resource usage either.

I'll keep it to see how it goes and to have a second program to open Office files with locally, but it's much better to either ask for open formats to companies, institutions and friends, or to complement with a proprietary fallback for now.

The app doesn't respect the OS styling so the window borders look awful. The worst issue is how huge everything is. The app doesn't respect automatic window sizing. It can't be used with everything so huge on my display. The developers never have respected OS styling, but it at least used to mostly work.

ONLYOFFICE has great compatibility with LibreOffice and MS Office files. The interface is straightforward - it feels a bit sparse, but the features I need are there. It's fast, smooth and comes with various spell check languages out of the box.

It could use some originality though, as it looks a lot like MS Office. It's nice to be familiar, but using the same fonts, interface colors, and styles (especially in spreadsheets) makes it feel kind of cheap to me.
No need for another installation of Chrome on my PC.
For all documents of my work, in M$ formats, OnlyOffice gave de best compatibility. So I don't have to use M$ Office anymore.
This program works fine but be aware there can naturally have apparent inconsistencies with libreoffice.
It doesn't support display scaling. Not recommended if you are using a 4k, high dpi display.
has a good gui to work around with! :D ^_^
summary: great for when i'm screen sharing on zoom

description: Latest version not available

After using Libre Office I find Only Office very slow and painful to use. On my Ubuntu Mate it doesn't conform to the rest of the software. It has its own style of interface that doesn't fit in with Ubuntu Mate. All my window buttons are on the top left but Only Office puts them on the top right and not matching in any way to my other windows. I'm not too fussed about looks but moving things around is very annoying for me.

I loaded some of my files and everything loaded fine and correctly, unlike when I try to load my files into Google Office. There doesn't seem to be any database so didn't test that side of it, only documents (.odt) and spreadsheets (.ods). I don't use presentations.

It looks like it has great possibilities if the speed and interface can be sorted out. I'm guessing the interface is designed to fit in with MS Windows so may be a good option for Windows users. Not for me, though. I'm going back to Libre Office for now.

description:
Have been using LO for years now but haven't been happy with the last couple of upgrades; thought I'd give OnlyOffice a go but it opens single page docs over 2 pages and I couldn't seem to sort a table.

Will stick with LibreOffice

There is much to like about the simple, clean interface but when you cannot chane drfault setting like the language and font and instead have to set these for each new document... well, why would you bother with it?

It is just as slow as libre office but it can't copy and paste data into a spreadsheet properly. Where Excel and Calc both paste the data in a single row, this one makes weird merged cells that mess up the equations and the sorting.
Very useful alternative
Very nice, useful and it's the best alternative for MS Office. Thank you.
This office package was prompted as being more compatible with MS Office than Libreoffice, however, I can't use it as it just keeps crashing, going back to Libreoffice, it has always been reliable.

OK, LibreOffice is a factory of features for every type of office poductivity functions. It's great for a book publisher. Most normal people don't have time to sift through this application landscape to write a serious document. OnlyOffice, on the other hand, is a very modern, capable office suite that allows organizations or the normal user to carry out the most important modern office productive functions such as word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, form functions, and collaboration and mobile functions. Most of its power comes from web integration, but the desktop application alone is very powerful. It is a genuine FOSS application and it even allows the user the use of "Private Rooms" to maintain your documents secured with AES-250 encryption. The interface is what a modern office suite applications should emulate because it is easy, navigable, and a pleasure to use. I would put it above google.com's and Microsoft's web offering for its ability to allow the normal user to do actual work.

It's a beautiful, logically organized, easy to use, easy to setup, easy to get good results from, ....., office suite. I find I can do everything I did with those others productivity applications without the pain or the time waste funnel. It looks like this development group actually calculated that human beings were going to use this application for productive purposes instead of text and functions sifting. 
It can only get better. Thank you development team.
summary: A capable office suite for humans

description:
I use the FlatPak of OnlyOffice for some pretty basic spreadsheet calculation / slide shows. 
I really like the user interface compared to LibreOffice. But i noticed some issues regarding spreadsheet:
Every time I open a certain spreadsheet, the width of the columns got smaller, diagrams disappear or reset the formatting and at some point the spreadsheet got insanely huge with around 18000 columns and row which dont contain anything but nevertheless its too big to open the document with LibreOffice. 
Now I know the origin of the name. OnlyOffice as in: The OnlyOffice your documents will ever be compatible with afterwards....

description: its not the "enterprise flagship" kind of thing, but a fairly feature-complete and lightweight, cross platform kind of thing , for people, who are starting to get mad, when trying to use libreoffice and similar powerful suites. Completamente compatible con microsoft services.

El programa funciona muy bien, es sencillo para trabajos poco exigentes, tiene excelente compatibilidad con microsoft office, incluso en eso es superior que libre office, pero tiene un pequeño problema que para mi es muy importante, el corrector ortográfico no es bueno, , por ejemplo, hay faltas de ortografía que me las señala, pero al momento de la correccíon no aparece la manera correcta, si lo compongo yo mismo, entonces no me marca la falta, aunque en las opciones de correccion ortográfico no aparecía. en lo demás esta muy bien, lo usaré para abrir documentos que me manden hechos en microsoft office, porque para hacer documentos no me sirve por ese detalle, pierdo mucho tiempo corregir las faltas yo mismo.
Es una maravilla y funciona genial, solo le falta la compatibilidad con las pantallas táctiles y que respete el gestor de ventanas.
summary: Lo único malo es la compatibilidad con pantallas táctiles

description: ojala lo mejore en por ejemplo en pegar fotos por ejemplo de whatsapp y que las pases hay pero no se puede sale como una exis encerrada en cuadrado ojala lo mejoren

En cuanto a compatibilidad de archivos me parece excelente y tambien la interfaz de usuario, es simple todo se encuentra facilmente pero a la hora de usar el corrector ortografico por lo memos para el español no funciona, no esta bien integrado y las opciones que muestra no corresponden a las palabras correctas, sería bueno que se pudiera integrar con herramientas como LanguageTool y hay si se podría considerar como una gran alternativa, muchas gracias por esta herramienta.

La versión que se ofrece permite realizar tareas comunes para cualquier persona y el trabajo de fondo para la estabilidad y compatibilidad de los documentos es destacable. El aspecto gráfico es también otro de sus puntos fuertes (aunque si solo nos interesa lo estético tenemos otras opciones como WPS o SoftMaker Office). En lo personal, tenerlo instalado con Flatpak es bastante recomendable y si se quiere entrar en más opciones entonces sí que LibreOffice es la mejor alternativa. 

El aspecto más negativo es su corrector ortográfico en español, una opción en la versión actual para solventar este inconveniente es descargarse desde GitHub el diccionario de LibreOffice e instalarlo navegando por el gestor de archivos (o desde la terminal) sustituyendo el que trae por defecto.
Tiene un diseño moderno y cumple por completo todas mis exigencias. Aunque tampoco soy un usuario avanzado.
Literalmente compatible con Office Word de Microsoft

description:
Antes editaba documentos de Microsoft office word, pero empezó a dañarme archivos originales y no lo quiero más.

NO abre documentos con encabezado ni pie de página y al poner una coma y guardar el trabajo elimina todo, al abrirlos en Windows el trabajo esta destrozado.
menque fonctionaliter

Part d'une bonne idée mais se vautre sur des fonctionnalités essentielles comme : 
- la génération de PDF (quasiment pas d'options)
- fait des lignes sur les images insérées sur les documents lors de la génération de PDF
- crée des PDF énormes dès qu'on choisis de les générer en couleur même avec des images de quelques kilo-octets (aucune option de compression !)
- déforme les documents répondant au standard OpenDocument (un comble !)

bref c'est parfait pour faire du cracra sur des documents MS, pour le reste à moins de vouloir mettre en place du collaboratif, passez votre chemin, ce logiciel est pensé pour les docx et xlsx de Microsoft.

À mon sens, quand on est sous Linux et que l'on cherche une suite bureautique autre que LibreOffice, c'est que l'on souhaite une compatibilité maximale avec MS Office (en situation de quasi monopole dans les entreprises privées).
D'autre part, l'interface bureautique la plus connue étant celle de Microsoft, on perdra moins de temps à s'approprier un logiciel qui "emprunte" beaucoup à cette dernière.
Enfin, la traduction de l'application en français ainsi que sa vitesse d'exécution sont bien meilleures que celles d'une autre suite bureautique, WPS Office, elle aussi bien meilleure que LibreOffice en termes de compatibilité Microsoft.
En conclusion, pour les raisons sus-mentionnées, la possibilité de mettre en place du collaboratif, ainsi qu'une compatibilité exhaustive avec les sytèmes d'exploitaion d'aujourd'hui (mobiles inclus), OnlyOffice est à mon avis la meilleure alternative, à la suite de Microsoft.
C'est vraiment une excellent application comptabile avec Ms Office de Windows

Минусов пока не нашел, но прога весьма хороша, как альтернатива LibreOffice. К слову сказать, последняя (возможно из-за обновления) не открывает файлы и не сохраняет, вместо этого выдает ошибку, якобы нет доступа со стороны пользователя. А так как пользователь один и он же админ, то предположил, что проблема была со стороны проги. Так точно! Установил эту прогу и ВСЁ ЗАРАБОТАЛО! Все форматы, которые прога видит, сохраняются и открываются без пролем! Плюс прога полностью русифицирована! 5 звёзд!

Спасибо разработчикам за труд! Пакет прекрасный, как альтернатива LO. Очень неплохо смотрится на меленьком экране с небольшим разрешением. Есть редактор формул, что для меня крайне важно! Почему 4 звезды: форматирование абзацев (стили) слетают при открытии некоторых (далеко не всех) документов MS Office, что неудобно так как стилями и перекрестными ссылками я пользуюсь очень и очень часто; работает намного медленнее чем LO и MSO - документ на 180 стр с картинками и таблицами открывался ну прямо безумно долго.
В целом мне очень нравится, а тем более что Yandex свой пакет основал на данном, то и совместимость документов с облаком хорошая.
Спасибо!

Поставил вместо FreeOffice, на котором сидел много лет. Внезапно понадобились некоторые функции, а они оказались уже в платном пакете. Ранее ставил ONLY понравилось, но текст был сильно мелковат и поэтому снес. Сейчас установил - все в меру на 14 дюймах, отлично смотрится! Один минус- открывается заметно медленнее того же Libre и FreeOffice. Но в целом могу рекомендовать смело. Пожирает доки MSOffice очень хорошо)

Рекомендую избегать этой программы.
Я пользовался этим офисом какое-то время назад и уже забыл, в чём был подвох. А вот сегодня посмотрел рекламу, установил, был всем доволен, снова создал в нём важный документ с диссертацией, целый день возился с правками и под конец дня нажал ctrl + S чтобы сохранить. И вкладка с файлом зависла.
И тут я всё вспомнил. Обидно, что снова труд целого дня потерян! В таком состоянии офис будет висеть хоть несколько дней, ничего не произойдёт. Никакого автосохранения не сработает. Одним словом, подстава!
summary: Не работайте с важными файлами, изменения могут не сохраниться
